Quaternion Function Reference

ndims

Number of array dimensions
(Quaternion and octonion overloadings of standard MATLAB® function)

Syntax

Y = ndims(X)

Description

ndims(X) returns the number of dimensions of the array X.

Examples

>> ndims(randq(3,2,2))

ans = 3

See Also

MATLAB® function: ndims
